chn: vi. 远足, 徒步旅行
example_en: We decided to hike through the mountains to enjoy the beautiful scenery.
example_cn: 我们决定徒步穿越山脉，享受美丽的风景。
word_family: hiker (n. 徒步旅行者), hiking (n. 徒步旅行)
memory_tips: 词源：'hike' 可能来源于中古荷兰语 'hikken'，意为“跳跃”或“移动”。联想记忆：想象自己在山间跳跃，进行徒步旅行。图像记忆：想象一幅山间小径的图片，人们背着背包，手持登山杖，正在徒步旅行。

image_prompt.main_image: A group of hikers walking on a mountain trail with backpacks and trekking poles, surrounded by lush green trees and a clear blue sky.
image_prompt.example_image: A scenic view of a mountain range with a small group of hikers visible on a trail, highlighting the beauty of the landscape and the activity of hiking.
